Today on the West Coast, Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are lighting up with 7 ft @ 13s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph SW winds. Best windows are from mid-morning to mid-afternoon, so get out there! Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @ 9s WSW with strong 39 mph S winds, making it poor for surfing. The day after, it remains poor with 11 ft @ 15s W swell and 27 mph SSW winds. Best: today.
